name: TDT (Alpha)
description:
Hi! What is TDT??

TDT in its current state is a personal project where I add whatever I find fun or interesting. It's focused on exploration and top-down combat (kinda bullet-helly at times?)

I will be uploading new demo versions every now and then, when I feel like I have something new to show. 

Right now you can, uh, fight a HUGE-ASS WORM?? Yeah! Download TDT version Alpha 0.4 and let me know what you think! :)
